sentences.en: He has a pitch on the High Street where he sells souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 他在大街上有个卖纪念品的摆摊处.

sentences.en: I bought a few trifles as souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 我买了些零碎的纪念品.

sentences.en: I want to buy some souvenirs. Can you suggest a good store?
sentences.cn: 我要买些纪念品, 请问哪一家店好?

sentences.en: I'd like to bring some souvenirs back home for my friends and relatives.
sentences.cn: 我想买一些纪念品带回去送给亲戚朋友.

sentences.en: No, I didn't buy any expensive souvenirs in New York.
sentences.cn: 下面我们把some跟any做个比较.

sentences.en: Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
sentences.cn: 出售非官方纪念品的推销员的生意也很红火。

sentences.en: She spent the morning buying souvenirs.

sentences.cn: 他们中间一些人强卖土产品.

sentences.en: The crew had been snipping it for souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 舰上人员把它剪下来当作纪念品.

sentences.en: The local shopkeepers sell souvenirs to the tourists.
sentences.cn: 当地的店主向旅游者出售纪念品.

sentences.en: These souvenirs were gathered from all parts of the world.
sentences.cn: 这些纪念品是从世界各地收集来的.

sentences.en: Vendors were doing a brisk trade in souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 商贩们的纪念品生意很红火。

sentences.en: When I got canned, I took these keys as souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 我被开除后，就拿了这些钥匙作为纪念。

sentences.en: When we top out, there will be souvenirs for everyone who has worked on the site.
sentences.cn: 当我们举行落成典礼时, 凡是在工地上劳动过的人都会得到纪念品.

words.tran_cn: 纪念品；旅游纪念品；回忆

trans.tran_cn: 纪念品( souvenir的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: A souvenir is something which you buy or keep to remind you of a holiday, place, or event
